scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NEXT_PRIVATE_LOCAL_WEBPACK=true next dev -p 3002
scripts.dev-debug: npm run clean && cross-env NEXT_PRIVATE_LOCAL_WEBPACK=true NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev -p 3002
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NEXT_PRIVATE_LOCAL_WEBPACK=true NODE_ENV=production next build
scripts.build-standalone: npm run clean && cross-env NEXT_PRIVATE_LOCAL_WEBPACK=true NODE_ENV=production STANDALONE_BUILD=true next build
scripts.build-start: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build-start:standalone: npm run build-standalone && npm run start-standalone
